ygData.subject: Time Is Against Us...

* Iron Raptor looks up and caught the two pieces of equipment as Prowl 
nearly flung them to her, simply setting the welder on the floor while she 
fiddeled with the suction hose.
She spied a inlet in the wall next to the table and clipped the end of the 
hose into it, then flicking a switch on the head of the device. Saticfied to 
hear the hiss of air being sucked in.
With a determined look she then hefted the welding gun, turning it on as she 
stuck the end of the scution hose into Dinobot's wound, hearing fluid being 
drawn into the tube and out of his body.
She had to wait for a sec for the welder to get hot enough to melt this bots 
armor, simply doing a patch up job until Dinobots repair system could 
activate and take over.
Iron Raptor shifted her weight we she waited but then, when the welder was 
hot enough, she lowered it into the woulnd and stopped just above the 
damaged lung.
This was tense!
Only the pit knew what sort of componants were in the body of a TM 2, and 
she didn't want to damage any of them more then they already were.
But, she still had to try.
With her arms, and her hands well inside Dinobots body, she spread the wound 
open more to get more light...but it didn't work much.*

" I need light in here..."

* With the suction she began extracting the mech-fluid from around the 
damaged lung, finally getting enough of it away to set the wender to work on 
the rip.
Iron Raptor squinted to see where the tip of the welding gun pressed against 
the top of the tare, slowly running it along to melt the armor and get it to 
cover the wound up.
At best, she guessed, there was probably still some fluid in the lungs, 
which meant that if Dinobot survived he would at least have a wet caught for 
a bit.
But time was still running short, and now she had less then 4 min to get 
both air and fluids back into his body.
And the more help she could get, the better.
Iron Raptor watched her work carefully.*

" Prowl, I need over 2 leters of water and liguid energon, quickly. Hook it 
up to the IV stand next to the CR chamber over there and get the tube riged 
up to it. Then shove the tube down his throat and get it into his stomach. 
The more fluids he can digest and reconform into mech-fluid the better."

* she then watched as the armor above the wound began to slowly warm and 
soften, hoping that it soon liquafied soon and covered the opening.*

" Depth Charge, grab a smaller tube and make a small slit in his throat 
right above the air way, sove the tub in there until I say to stop.
Then grab a resporator and hook it up to the other end, but don't switch it 
on intul I say, alright?"

* And with that she continued to work, hoping that Dinobot could hold on 
until they were through.*
